    • Method Detail

      • activateEffect

        public void activateEffect(Player weaponUser,
                           java.util.List<Player> enemyChosenList)
                    throws EnemySizeLimitExceededException
        It activate the effect of the weapon doing damage and marking the player in the enemyChosenList, which has to be one and no more. After the damage, it move the user player in the same square of the enemy hitted.
        Overrides:
        activateEffect in class WeaponEffect
        Parameters:
        weaponUser - user player
        enemyChosenList - list of the enemy chosen from the user
        Throws:
        javax.naming.SizeLimitExceededException - whenever the enemy size list is greater than expected
        EnemySizeLimitExceededException - whenever the enemy size list is greater than expected
